flawed_nl_solution:
Rock and Roll CDs will be 5*4 = <<5*4=20>>20 dollars.
Pop CDs will be 10*4 = <<10*4=40>>40 dollars.
Dance CDs will be 3*4 = <<3*4=12>>12 dollars.
Country CDs will be 7*4 = <<7*4=28>>28 dollars.
In total Julia would need 20+40+12+28 = <<20+40+12+28=1000>>1000 dollars.
Julia is short 1000-75 = <<1000-75=925>>925 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
